camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Long-range Skyline Panorama, Eye-level Aerial Shot, Telephoto compressed perspective
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: Telephoto lens (100mm-200mm equivalent), High perspective compression (flattening depth between foreground and background), Rectilinear projection
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Infinite depth of field, Sharp details across all architectural layers

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Dramatic Sunset, Golden Hour (Sun low on horizon)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Strong Directional Sunlight (Frontal light from the direction of the lens), Volumetric atmospheric scattering, High Contrast (Chiaroscuro), Rim lighting on buildings
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Burning dramatic sky, Broken Altocumulus clouds catching bright orange/pink light, Clear air with slight atmospheric haze enhancing depth
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Long horizontal cast shadows, Deep cool violet/blue shadows in urban canyons contrasting with intense warm highlights

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Minimal interior lighting (overpowered by natural sunset), Faint warm window spill in shadowed lower buildings
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Blinding specular reflections of sunset on glass, Golden sheen on building structures, Warm illumination of building surfaces

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Natural grazing light on rooftops, highlighting texture of roof tiles and geometric city blocks
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Sun-drenched tree canopies appearing warm orange/brown, Deep shadows beneath trees, Dense urban forest texture

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Warm Analogous with Cool Shadows, Burning Orange/Vermillion/Gold Sky vs Slate Blue/Violet Shadows
color_and_grading.temperature: Dominant Warm Color Temp (3500K-4000K) on illuminated faces, Cool Shadow Temp (7500K)
color_and_grading.post_processing: High Saturation, Cinematic Warmth, Increased Clarity and Structure, HDR tone mapping to balance bright sky and dark city

rendering_tech_specs.engine_style: V-Ray 6 (Sun & Sky system), Corona Renderer, Unreal Engine 5
rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Cinematic Urban Landscape Photography, National Geographic Style Cityscape
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Hyper-realistic cloud textures, Intricate rooftop details, Sharp skyline silhouettes

environment_textures.ground_surface: Asphalt roads glowing from streetlights, Dense urban fabric
environment_textures.foliage_style: Autumnal or warm-lit urban plants, Dense patches of trees separating architectural layers
